item.title: Yealink
item.description: This website describes how i got involved in researching the security of products of the Chinese telecommunication manufacturer Yealink. This research led to many interesting events and it was eventually published in the a number of international media, such as: Follow The Money (NL/EN) L’echo (FR) De Tijd (BE) Le Vif (FR) Le Soir (FR) During the research conducted by myself and journalists Siem Eikelenboom and Sebastiaan Brommersma numerous technical security issues were uncovered.
